title: Neo Pax Sivir Giveaway!!!!

replies.body:
Hey, guys, the winners have been decided. I have chosen some winners based on their reason for wanting the skin and some winners have also be decided by random. thanks for everyone that participated and can't wait till my next giveaway! 

Winners: ƒáte
                MysticLlamaZ
                Captain Youi
                
i will send a friend request in game to all winners. if you do not respond within 24 hours the code will be given to someone else.

Thanks everyone for partcipating! 

kageyama Tobio - {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Thank you very much!!!
OMG thank you so much!!!
Omg I won

**IGN: Itachi Uchiha **

I would like the skin, I don't think I've done anything 'deserving' of it. My usual role on the boards is devils advocate, so I'm not exactly a saint.
I just want it, and for lack of anything else to say im going to list why I want it.

I want it because it is limited-edition/legacy, and I absolutely despise limited-edition/legacy content because there is no reason for any line of code to be 'limited'. But that doesn't stop me from being a collector, I have every legacy skin in the game _(with one painful exception that I need to wait til valentines day for)_, and collect every limited skin I can when I can _(and riot does not make it easy....)_

If I do not find a way of getting a code for it, I will NOT be able to get the skin, plain and simple, despite how badly I want it.

1. Because not only do I not live in Melbourne where pax is, nor in fact do I even live in Australia, I do not even live on the same continent! So needless to say, the chances of me making it to Pax without winning the lottery are quite literally nil.

2. Because I have earned every chest from every mission and from every weekly S gain, likewise with Key fragments. Plus I have bought every gemstone when available _(with 1 xmas exception)_. I have never spent a gemstone, and only have 8 gemstones total. Meanwhile my friend is also on 8 gemstones.... AFTER he bought hextech annie with his first 10. So I am not a lucky guy, and **will not** have enough gemstones to purchase Sivir before she retires.

I have argued with riot at every turn about there being a 'limited time' skin that 90% of players will not have access to. And I disagree wholeheartedly with there being such a skin in the first place. But I will do whatever I have to in order to obtain it, up to and including making a fool of myself on the boards in a last ditch attempt to win it. And should that fail, I will have to turn to begging pretty much everyone on the boards, should that also fail, ill be emptying my already empty wallet into every fake code on eBay until I find one that works.... :'(

Im desperate, and I'm trying every avenue I can to get it :S

_________

_PS. [Unrelated] is your name from 'Haikyuu!!'? I approve greatly of the anime references!! :D_

yea it is from Haikyuu!! its my favourite anime haha

just waiting for season 4 to be announced!!!!!!!!!! hopefully soon {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

I thought i recognised the name haha nicely done!
Hopefully it comes soon! These things are well worth the wait xD

My favourite is Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood, but all the names from that seem to be taken already haha.

but I like Itachi from _Naruto_ and Sesshomaru from _Inuyasha_ just as much xD 
So I'm proud to have them for names :P
I think you deserve it

Someone has very very kindly gifted me a code, so please exclude me from this competition!
I dont want someone else to miss out on the off chance that I won.

Also I did some reading and couldn't find anything concrete about the release date of season 4 :(
But hopefully it comes out soon!!

IGN: AvadaKedav

If I got this skin, I would donate it to my friend who is an adc main and would greatly appreciate this wonderful donation.

{{sticker:katarina-love}} 



PS: Love you <3

IGN: ƒáte
Hi c: I'm fate. I was unable to attend to Saturday's event unfortunately as much as I always wanted to go to PAX however the tickets sold out... Fairly unlucky on my behalf... considering that the day I was given the opportunity to purchase the tickets... It became sold out. I guess it was just my fate ;-; I was also unable to attend on other days due to appointments that I have made in previous weeks... If I was ever given the chance to purchase the tickets early... I would have done so. I guess just not my day haha. Sivir has always been my pocket pick as I have a 100% win ratio on her over a fair amount of games. She has very great wave clear and lane pressure as well as damage output in team fights including her ultimate which also gives the team a fair amount of utility. I love playing her and receiving that skin would allow me to make use of that skin to it's full potential :c I would love to receive that skin. Thank you for reading Kageyama Tobio.

fate~!
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}  Good luck everyone~

IGN: MysticLlamaZ

I guess all I can say is I really don’t own many skins at all and it would be really cool if I could just have this amazing skin, you see I got an account lost in season 6 which I had spent about $2000 which is a lot for me and now I don’t trust not losing it again so I don’t spend money :(.
I live in New Zealand so my only opportunity for riot skins was in 2014 with arcade Mf and riot Kayle at at Armageddon but they don’t do it anymore and i lost those skins on my account that got hacked :(... 

Pax sivir will turn this shitty year into a good one I have always LOVED the model it looks amazing for one of my OG mains and if you give it to me you can always count on me being a friend and can add me in game any time and I’ll for sure play with you even if yo wanna discord and chill as well.

Cheers, MysticLlamaz

When I first read this dude I thought it was soft story XD then I reread and it actually seems legit af lmao. Unlucky living in NZ with no PAX and also sorry bout your old account man sounds like a pretty shitty year :(

IGN: uwotm8hd
I think i should get the skin because ur a skux lad and ur radical and you would donate the skin to a poor boi that is looking for some love. PLease give me this skin so i can be fufullied in life.

IGN: Captain Youi

I've seen a lot of decent responses here but you did say codes in plural so heres hoping. I'd like this skin because although i haven't played much sivir this season she was one of the first adc's i learnt to play a few years ago and having a skin for her would be really nice since i cant really afford to buy it myself (uni costs + it isnt even in store). No matter how many chests i try to open I still cant manage to get my hands on this siv skin AND i only have 1 gemstone unluckiest guy ever. Anyway thanks for being generous enough to give out the codes (here from discord).

IGN: Fizzics

Reason: Would be nice to add a skin to my collection, due to circumstances that delay me from being able to buy Riot Points for skins.  Probably the reason why I have 16 unopened chests and waiting for key fragments to roll in.  Being able to own an unavailable skin as well would be really nice, as the only time I get them is when they are either 75% on sale or gifted. 

Goodluck Summoners. 

Thanks, 
- Fizzics.
